attributes.action: Protect care staff on zero hour contracts- due to covid-19
attributes.additional_details: I want something put in place to protect and take stress of these workers as they are the ones out their looking after our vulnerable during this crisis
attributes.background: Most care staff are on zero hour contracts, they have to work during this crisis. They are at highrisk of catching Covid-19 and putting their family at risk to make sure people are looked after. If they catch this and have to self isolate they will have no financial security.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307650

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
